attributes.action: The United Kindom govenment to publish the detailed plans they have for Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: We believe that this is only way to get an unbiased view from the govenment on this matter as these plans will deal with the reality on the ground and not the Punch and Judy politics that supported this debate. If such plans do not exist it would be very concerning.
attributes.background: The United Kingdom government must have contingency plans for a UK exit from the EU. In order for voters to get to the facts in this matter they need to have access to the unbiased view of the civil servants who are tasked with executing an EU exit if that is the result of the vote.
